mapper.insert: insert into option_value values(NEXTVAL(seq_option_value_no), #{optionValue}, #{optionValueCost},(select option_no from (select * from product_option order by 1 desc) where rownum = 1))
mapper.select: select a.option_no, a.option_name, GROUP_CONCAT(b.option_value ORDER BY b.option_value SEPARATOR ',') as option_values from product_option a, option_value b where a.option_no = b.option_no group by a.option_no, a.option_name order by a.option_no desc

SELECT c.CATEGORY_NAME, a.PRODUCT_NAME, a.LIST_TITLE, a.SALE_PRICE, a.REG_DATE, c.CATEGORY_NO FROM product a JOIN product_img b ON(a.product_no = b.PRODUCT_NO) left JOIN category c ON(a.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE b.IMG_LEVEL = 1
mapper.update: update option_value set option_value = #{optionValue}, option_value_cost = #{optionValueCost} where option_value_no = #{optionValueNo}
update product_option set option_name = #{optionName} where option_no = #{optionNo}
